## Recommended dataset:
All these datasets is installed in the **data** folder.
1. the government response data collected by a group at Oxford (I have uploaded the dataset to RStudio. The version is 97a4b5ccadfc15210864ecf5810697309f36aa57) (policy.csv)
https://www.bsg.ox.ac.uk/research/research-projects/covid-19-government-response-tracker#data
2. GAPMINDER: Income per person (income.csv), Population (population.csv)
3. weather data, which can be download for free from the National Climatic Data Center (only three European countries (Weather_Europe.csv) and Japan (Weather_Japan.csv))
https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/
